about_the_game:
Nightsteel Survivors is a 2D shooter with "roguelite" elements where you'll need to make strategic decisions as you navigate through a dangerous laboratory filled with enemy robots. You'll have multiple characters to choose from, each with unique abilities, and you'll face challenging and exciting bosses. Upgrade your skills and gear to survive and escape the Nightsteel labyrinth.

  • Multiple characters to choose from, each with unique abilities and a different playstyle.
  • An exciting 2D shooter game with "roguelite" elements that requires strategic decision-making.
  • Challenging robotic enemies and hordes of enemies that will test your combat skills.
  • Exciting bosses that require specific skills and strategies to defeat.
  • A wide variety of abilities and upgrades available to improve your character as you progress.
  • Hazards and traps throughout the laboratory that will test your attention and survival skills.
